name: Girls und Panzer: Dream Tank Match
name_original: Girls und Panzer: Dream Tank Match
description: Girls und Panzer: Dream Tank Match (ガールズ＆パンツァードリームタンクマッチ) is a tank battle game based on Girls und Panzer Anime. It's developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment, released in February 22nd, 2018 for the PS4. An English-language version was released a week later, February 27th, 2018.
